column1: CENTRAL BANK OF SRI LANKA | ANNUAL REPORT 2022

column3: Special  Import  License  Regulations  No.  01  of  2023  (published  in  the  Gazette
Extraordinary No. 2312/77) were issued with a consolidated list of goods, for which
the importation requires an import control licence, and selected items, for which the
issuance of Import Control License was suspended until further notice.
Imports and Exports (Control) Regulations No. 02 of 2023 (published in the Gazette
Extraordinary  No.  2312/78)  were  issued  with  a  consolidated  list  of  imports  under
temporary  suspension  and  introduced  terms  for  exemptions  with  the  approval  of
Imports  Control  Regulations  on  Payment  Terms  No.  03  of  2023  (published  in  the
Gazette  Extraordinary  No.  2315/46)  were  issued  extending  the  date  of  arrival  of
import consignments of wheat flour at the port or airport in Sri Lanka under the Open
Account and Consignment Account Payment Terms up to 31 January 2023.
